full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN BLA'I MDO CHOG GI SNYING PO BSDUS PA YID BZHIN GYI NOR BU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022A *, ,(CES PA 'DI YANG DENG SANG GI SKYE BO 'GA' LA PHAN PAR 'DOD PA'I BSAM PAS, CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GZIMS KHANG DU SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE BA 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
